items.summary: Rebuild and deploy the application using the code exactly as it exists in draft version 52, discarding drafts 53 and 54 and making no functional or visual changes beyond selecting draft 52 for the live deployment.

After deploying draft 52, verify that the "Voice Announcements" toggle default state matches draft 52 behavior (it should be OFF on initial load, as observed in version 52), and ensure the deployed build reflects that draft-52 default without carrying over draft-54 behavior.
Update the live release metadata to reflect that Draft 52 is now the live deployed version (update the constants in frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts accordingly).
